thread.title: Which Premier League team has fared the best when Mark Clattenburg has been in charge?
thread.title_full: Which Premier League team has fared the best when Mark Clattenburg has been in charge?

author: David Dubas-Fisher
title: Which Premier League team has fared the best when Mark Clattenburg has been in charge?
text:
Sport Which Premier League team has fared the best when Mark Clattenburg has been in charge? Clattenburg will leave England at the end of the season to take up a lucrative role in the Middle East Share Mark Clattenburg is the Premier League's most high-profile referee (Photo: Laurence Griffiths) Share Get daily     
Tottenham have fared better under Mark Clattenburg than any other current top-flight club. 
The Saudi Arabia-bound ref is set to remain in the Premier League for the rest of the season before heading over to take up a new role in the Middle East. 
This may be welcome news to Spurs, who have a better win ratio in league games refereed by Clattenburg over the last four seasons than any other current Premier League club. 
The Euro 2016 final ref has taken charge of 11 Spurs league games in that time with the north London club winning almost two thirds of those - seven - as well as losing two and drawing two. 
Leicester have the next best record under Clattenburg with a win ratio of 62%, followed by Stoke with a win ratio of 60%. Clattenburg reffed Tottenham's win over Middlesbrough earlier this month (Photo: REUTERS) Stoke also have a decent record when Clattenburg has reffed them (Photo: REUTERS) 
News of Clattenburgâ€™s delayed departure may not go down so well at Selhurst Park, though. 
Crystal Palace have failed to win ANY of the 11 league matches which Clattenburg has officiated, drawing four and losing seven. 
Middlesbrough have also failed to win a Premier League game in which Clattenburg was refereeing over the last four seasons - but then there has only been one! Crystal Palace will be glad to see the back of Clattenburg (Photo: Richard Heathcote) Club: Win%
